description: This meatball dish is delicious but simple with delicate aniseed flavours complementing the pork.
name: Simple Pork & Fennel Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the onion, garlic, thyme and fennel to the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes. Pour over chicken stock and vinegar, add the apples and meatballs and cover with a lid. Simmer for 20-25 minutes and serve.
